text: Devit faragha nguibar ekiar kam ko mɨsoghasa kamaghɨn uan mɨdorozir gumazibav gei, “Gumazir manam bar faraghɨvɨra Jebusian gumazitam mɨsueghtɨ an aremegham, a nan mɨdorozir gumazibar gumazir dapanimɨn ikiam.” Ezɨ Seruian otarim Joap, a faragha ghua mɨdorozim fore. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Devit anemɨsevezɨ, a mɨdorozir gumazibar gumazir dapanimɨn oto.
